_comments.cross-env: package to handle environment variables same way across all types of shell
_comments.eslint: package to handle minor issues while developing an app like handling types and unnecessary used variable
_comments.supertest: package to handle api calls while testing any test case
_comments.husky: package used for managing Git hooks, such as pre-commit or pre-push hooks
_comments.lint-staged: package which automatically runs linters on staged files as part of the pre-commit hook.
_comments.http-errors: package to add global error handler
_comments.pg: package to connect postgreSQL db with express app
_comments.reflect-metadata: package to handle destructors on postgres SQL db schema
_comments.typeorm: package to add layers between app and database to hadnle all types of queries like SQL and NOSQL
_comments.winston: package to add logger in app
_comments.express-validator: package to add validation on request body
